pages.text: 53|45|arau niscaya teraemi srsti karaiche yora-yorakai purausa arau narai
53|46|sukrabindura paraa, yetiya i skhalita haya
53|47|arau niscaya punaraut'thana ghatoraara dayitba'o te'omrae'i
53|48|arau niscaya teraemi abharamukta karae arau sampada pradana karae
53|49|arau niscaya teraemi asba-sbi’raa naksatrara pratipalaka.
53|50|Arau teraemi praacina ‘ada jatika dhbansa karaiche
53|51|arau chamuda jatiko (dhbansa karaiche). Sihamtara ejanako arasista rakha na'i.
53|52|Arau iyara purbe nuhara sampradayako (teraemi dhbansa karaiche). Niscaya sihamta achila atisaya yalima arau carama abadhya.
53|53|Arau teraemi olota'i diya abasabhumika niksepa karaichila
53|54|tara pichata se'ito acchanna karaichila yi acchanna karaibalagiya achila.
53|55|Eteke tumi tomara pratipalakara konato anugraha samparke sandeha posana karaiba
53|56|atitata satarkakaraisakalara darae'i e'i nabi'o ejana satarkakarai.
53|57|Kiyamata nikatararti.
53|58|Allahara bahirae kone'o iyaka prakasa karaibalai saksama nahaya.
53|59|Tomaloke e'i kathata bismaya bodha karaicha neki
53|60|arau hamhi-thatraa karaicha! Kanda na'i
53|61|arau tomaloke udasina
53|62|eteke tomaloke allahaka chajada karaa arau te'omra ibadata karaa.
54|1|Kiyamata nikatararti haiche arau candra bidirna haiche
54|2|arau sihamte kono nidarsana dekhile mukha ghuraa'i laya arau kaya, ‘eyato ciraacaraita yadu’.
54|3|Arau sihamte asbikara karae arau nija nija prabrttira anusarana karae, athaca pratito bisaye'i sesa laksyata upanita ha’ba.
54|4|Arau sihamtara ocarata sambadasamuha ahi pa'iche, ya’ta ache satarkabani
54|5|eta paraipurna hikamata, kintu bhitipradarsana sihamtara kono kamata aha na'i.
54|6|Eteke tumi sihamtaka upeksa karaa. (Smarana karaa) yidina ahbanakaraiye ahbana karaiba eta bhayaraha parainamara phale
